name: Master Classes
description:
UPCOMING CLASSES 
FROM GEMSTONES TO JEWELLERY  Thursday 28th November 6:30-9:00pm 2013
An evening of Gemstones Thursday 28th November 6:30-9:00pm (with mulled wine & biscuits) with visiting expert Gemmologist Rowena Murray.
Rowena Murray is an experienced jewellery designer and graduate of the Royal College of Art, with a gemmologist qualification from the Gemological Institute of America.
Alongside her own collections, Rowena has consulted for major brands including Accessorize and Van Cleef â€¦
In this  introduction to Gemmology, you will learn about the different varieties of  gemstones and how to  source and then use them successfully in your jewellery. 
 You will also get a reference guide written by Rowena to take home, the aim of this class is to provide you with the tools to select, buy and design for gems with confidence. 
It is almost December so we will have some mulled wine and nibbles as well to keep you toasty in the workshop.

name: Bowl Raising Master Class
description:
Learn the ancient technique of hand raising to create bowls and hollow  forms in metal. 
Using hammers and a selection of silversmiths tools you will be guided through the process of hammering to create a copper bowl. 
You will also get plenty of practice in heating and annealing, blocking, raising, planishing and finishing! 
Held over two days 
Copper is included in the course fees and  you can work in silver at an additional cost please contact me when booking to arrange this and get a quote for your silver! 

The class is limited to 4 people maximum to allow for lots of one to one tuition and as always we will have plenty of tea, coffee, drinks and nibbles to keep you going!

name: Stone Setting Masterclass
description:
This course is great for those who have attended the evening classes, learn how to make a bezel setting and claw setting to add another dimension to your jewellery making. 
Held over two consecutive Saturdays or 3 evening classes you will be taken through the process of making a  bezel setting and a simple claw setting and then set free to design and make your own item of jewellery including a setting of your choice.

As each design will be unique Materials and stones will be available to buy during the class and are charge in addition to the course fee. 
NEXT Dates  Saturday 5th & 12th January 2013 10:00 am-2pm
Monday Evenings  14th January - 28th January 6:30-9pm
Monday Evening     11th February-25th February 6:30-9pm

name: Silver Earrings Saturday morning class
description:
Suitable for beginners
You will learn how to hand cut, pattern and shape silver sheet and silver wire  to make yourself a pair of silver earrings all before lunchtime!
Techniques covered include soldering, texturing, filing, cutting and finishing. 
Class is held on a Saturday morning 10:30 am - 1:30pm 

Price includes materials, tea and biscuits 

To buy this class as a gift please add a note  in the paypal check out including the address you would like the voucher sent to and add the gift voucher postage to your order from the drop down options box below.   We will then post our your voucher in a beautifully printed card with golden envelope and info about the workshop.

name: Silver hammered ring Saturday morning class
description:
A short course where you will get to make a selection of pretty hammered silver rings. 

You will get to hammer, form, file and solder silver to create a silver ring all in a morning!

The price includes all materials, tea, coffees and biscuits. 

Class is held on a Saturday morning 10:30am - 1:30pm
all classes are limited to a maximum of 5 people
Can be arranged for groups as a bespoke workshop please email me for details mail@thequarterworkshop.com 
To buy this class as a gift please add a note  in the paypal check out including the address you would like the voucher sent to and add the gift voucher & postage to your order from the drop down options box below.

name: silver decorative pendants and charms class click for dates
description:
Learn how to use the jewellers piercing saw to cut patterns and shapes from silver creating your own charm or  pendant designs. 
A selection of ribbons and threads will be available to complete your design. 

Class is Â£85
All tools and materials are included. 
Plenty of teas, coffee and refreshments will be provided. 
usual class times 11am-3pm
PLEASE READ FURTHER INFORMATION ABOUT BOOKING ON THE WORKSHOP PAGE

name: Hand make a silver ring and bangle click for dates
description:
Suitable for beginners and intermediate 
Spend a day in a traditional jewellers workshop making your very own sterling silver ring & bangle.  Click on the box below for available dates 
You will learn how to shape, hammer, solder, file and finish your ring ready for you to take home at the end of the day. 
Class is priced at Â£85 
Materials and all equipment are included as well as a good suply of tea, coffee, cold drinks, nibbles and cake! 
 11am - 3:00 pm including break for lunch.

All jewellery  classes are limited to a maximum of 4-5 people to allow lots of one to one tuition. 

To buy this class as a gift please add a note  in the paypal check out including the address you would like the voucher sent to and add the gift voucher postage to your order from the drop down options box below.   We will then post our your voucher in a beautifully printed card with golden envelope and info about the workshop. 


PLEASE READ FURTHER INFORMATION ABOUT BOOKING ON THE WORKSHOP PAGE

name: Evening Classes
description:
Beginners evening courses in Silver Jewellery Making 
The classes run from 6.30pm-8:30pm once a week from the start date for 6 consecutive weeks.   Wednesday Evenings or Monday Evenings 
Covering all the basic hand making techniques to get started in silver jewellery making, students can expect to make three finished silver pieces by the end of the course.  Learning about all the tools, processes and how to work with silver along the way. 
You will be hand piercing, filling, shaping, forging, soldering and finishing! 
materials and silver is included within the class fees.
The class is limited to 4-5  people to allow for lots of one to one tuition. 
Take a look at our testimonials page  (link at bottom of page) to see what our students have to say about our classes! 
Scroll down to book
Buy as a gift?  scroll down for more info

Beginners  6 week course Â£145 includes materials
Starting 
Wed 15th January 2014 6:30- 8:30pm for 6 weeks 
Mon 20th January 2014 6:30-8:30pm for 6 weeks
Wed 5th March 2014 6:30-8:30pm for 6 weeks 

INTERMEDIATE & IMPROVERS for those with previous jewellery making experience or have attended the beginners course
Â£165 ( does not include materials) 
Thursday evenings 6:30-8:30pm
Starting Thursday 16th January for 8 weeks 

Perfect for those who have attended the beginners course or have a prior knowledge of jewellery Making.

 To buy this class as a gift please add a note  in the paypal check out including the address you would like the voucher sent to and add the gift voucher postage to your order from the drop down options box below.   We will then post our your voucher in a beautifully printed card with golden envelope and info about the workshop. 
PLEASE READ THE BOOKING INFORMATION PAGE

name: Jewellery For Gentlemen
description:
A range of classes using hand making techniques including hand piercing, hammering, filing and soldering. 
Perfect to create a personalised gift for a stylish gentlemen or why not buy the class for the man in your life. 

Silver Cufflinks Class
working with sterling silver sheet, wire  and chain you will design and make a pair of silver cufflinks, adding patterns, texture or even personalising with letter stamps or numbers. You could add the date of your anniversary, wedding perhaps or initials. 

Silver Cufflinks & Collar Stiffeners class - please email me for dates
Hand make a silver set of jewellery items including sterling silver cufflinks and collar stiffeners, you will learn a variety of techniques and have the chance to personalise your designs.

name: Hammered Chain Bracelet class click for dates
description:
Using a selection of silver wires you will learn how to shape, solder and add texture by hammering adding pattern to your silver wire to create a decorative silver chain linked bracelet  complete with hand made toggle fixing. 
You will learn the valuable skills of working with wire to create jump rings, adding textures and patterns as well as lots of soldering practice!

All tools and materials are included as well as refreshments. 

To buy this class as a gift please add a note  in the paypal check out including the address you would like the voucher sent to and add the gift voucher postage to your order from the drop down options box below.   We will then post our your voucher in a beautifully printed card with golden envelope and info about the workshop. 


10:30am - 3:00 pm with a break for lunch 
PLEASE READ FURTHER INFORMATION ABOUT BOOKING ON THE WORKSHOP PAGE
 

Limited to maximum 4 people .

name: Silver Spoon Forging Master Class Click for dates
description:
A two day course held over two consecutive Sundays or Saturdays or over a weekend

 You will learn the process of hand forging, shaping the metal by hammering and heating. Punching a spoon bowl, hand piercing, filing and finally polishing. 

You will create your very own sterling silver spoon to take home. The material cost ( a solid silver bar which you will form into a spoon) is included in the price.
 
This course is limited to 4 people, materials are included as well as a good supply of teas, coffee and refreshments.  


PLEASE READ FURTHER INFORMATION ABOUT BOOKING ON THE WORKSHOP PAGE

name: Make your own wedding Rings
description:
What could be more special than hand crafting each others wedding rings. 
You will be expertly guided through the process to create your rings, from design to heating, shaping, hammering, soldering and finally finishing ready to be sent to the Assay Office to be Hallmarked.  I will also do any additional finishing, polishing and resizing for you which is included in the price.
When booking we will discuss what materials you would like to use so I can order them prior to your workshop. 
extras can also be arranged including engraving and the edition of stones. 
Price shown is per couple and an additional cost for the materials chosen will be added to the Â£250 to give a final cost for the workshop including the boxed finished rings and hallmarking. 
The classe are held in our workshop here in the jewellery Quarter, Birmingham, West Midlands UK 
 Please contact me with your ideas and I can provide you with a final quote.

options.name: material Gold or silver will be extra please contact me to dicuss

name: Bespoke workshops from
description:
Here at the workshop we like to put on something special and create a truly inspiring event for you, We are happy to arrange bespoke workshops and jewellery making parties for groups of all ages and abilities.  Price is dependant on group size and items chosen to make and any little extras please email me to discuss ideas mail@thequarterworkshop.com 
  
"thank you so much for the jewellery party today. we all had a fab time and loved every minute of it. my daughter had a brilliant 11th birthday making a silver ring and pendant. see you again!!"


"We all had a great time last Saturday and really enjoyed your workshop. 
You explained all the processes really well so it was informative and interesting without being too technical and your workshop is a lovely, peaceful space with a great view from those amazing windows!
We were all thrilled with the rings and amazed we could create something which looked so good - all thanks to your skilled tutoring.
There's nothing we'd change as we thought you had it just right and it was certainly a perfect activity for my big birthday!" 

" All of the guests really enjoyed themselves - everyone was involved and delighted with the charm  they produced for the bracelet. The event will be a talking point for a long time to come!" 13th Birthday party
   
"We spent around three hours creating, nattering and indulging in some rather fancy cookies and we each left with two beautiful hand-made silver rings!"

Read about a birthday party held at the workshop by following the link on the "about" page 

 Have a look at our testimonials page for more comments!

name: Gift Vouchers from
description:
Vouchers can be used against or towards all upcoming classes and courses at the workshop provided spaces are available and are valid for 6 months after the date of purchase.

Printed on good quality card and featuring a picture of the silversmithing tools  we use everyday in the workshop complete with a lovely golden envelope! 
 We can arrange to send these directly to the recipient or to you so you can add your own personal message. Please add a note in the paypal checkout stating the address and name you would like the voucher sent to. 
 Just choose your amount, (postage will be added automatically) & we will make a card up for you and pop it in the post.  
All Vouchers are sent by royal mail recorded delivery - Royal mail aims to deliver recorded items the next day but it is not a guaranteed next day service.

name: Jewellery Collection A Piece of Gold
description:
These are the first pieces from The Quarterworkshop jewellery  collection. 

Stylish, Statement &  Simple,  

Sterling silver with a gold plating 

 Available in Ball or Cube and in ring sizes 
Small 
Medium 

All items are sent by royal mail special delivery and boxed in a contemporary black jewellery box.
